passive.name: MARK OF THE STORM
passive.description:
(PASSIVE) MARK OF THE STORM
                                Hitting enemies with abilities places a Mark of the Storm on them for 6 seconds. At 3 stacks, the enemy is stunned for 1.25 seconds and Kennen gains 25 Energy.Stunning an enemy multiple times within 6 seconds reduces the stun duration to 0.5 seconds.

q.name: (Q) THUNDERING SHURIKEN
q.description:
(Q) THUNDERING SHURIKEN
 6,8/5,9/4,9/3,9s   60/55/50/45 
                                
                                
                                Throws a shuriken, dealing 75 magic damage (75/140/205/270 + 75% ) to the first enemy hit.

w.name: (W) ELECTRICAL SURGE
w.description:
(W) ELECTRICAL SURGE
 12/10/8/6s   40 
                                
                                
                                Passive: Every 5th attack deals 55 bonus magic damage (55/65/75/85 + 70/80/90/100% bonus  + 30% ) and applies a Mark of the Storm.Active: Shocks nearby enemies afflicted by Mark of the Storm, dealing 70 magic damage (70/100/130/160 + 80% ).

e.name: (E) LIGHTNING RUSH
e.description:
(E) LIGHTNING RUSH
 7.5/7/6.5/6s   100/95/90/85 
                                
                                
                                Transform into an electric ball for 2 seconds, becoming unable to attack but gaining 100% bonus Movement Speed and dealing 70 magic damage (70/120/170/220 + 70% ) to enemies he passes through. The bonus Movement Speed is doubled during the first 0.5 seconds. Kennen gains 50/60/70/80% Attack Speed for 3 seconds upon exiting Lightning Rush.Gains 40 Energy when Lightning Rush first damages an enemy.Deals 50% damage to minions.

r.name: (R) SLICING MAELSTROM
r.description:
(R) SLICING MAELSTROM
 80/75/70s  
                                
                                
                                Summons a storm that grants Kennen 20/40/60 Armor and Magic Resist and deals 20 magic damage (20/55/90 + 13% ) every 0.5 seconds for 3 seconds. Each subsequent bolt against the same target deals 10% increased damage.Only applies 3 Marks of the Storm to a single target.

situational_items_detailed.passive: Overkill: Increases Ability Power by 20-45% based on level
situational_items_detailed.description: This item is perfect for mages who rely on high ability power ratios and want to significantly increase their damage output. It provides a huge bonus to ability power and magic penetration. The 'Overkill' effect increases your ability power by 20-45%, depending on the level, significantly enhancing your magical abilities and attacks. This item is especially useful against enemy teams that lack magic resistance or have squishy targets, as it allows you to significantly boost your damage and deal massive magic damage.

keystone_detailed.description: You and your nearby ally gain a shield when either of you would take damage from an enemy champion.

runes_detailed.description: After taking damage from an enemy champion, the next 3 spells or attacks you receive from them deal reduced damage.
